culturalPerspectives.name: Western
culturalPerspectives.description: European and American aesthetic traditions emphasizing individualism, innovation, and analytical thinking

culturalPerspectives.name: Eastern
culturalPerspectives.description: East Asian aesthetic traditions emphasizing harmony, tradition, and holistic thinking

culturalPerspectives.description: African aesthetic traditions emphasizing community, rhythm, storytelling, and Ubuntu philosophy

culturalPerspectives.description: Latin American aesthetic traditions emphasizing passion, family bonds, and magical realism

culturalPerspectives.description: South Asian aesthetic traditions emphasizing spirituality, karma, and festival culture

culturalPerspectives.name: Oceanic
culturalPerspectives.description: Oceanic aesthetic traditions emphasizing nature connection, navigation, and oral tradition

culturalPerspectives.name: Indigenous
culturalPerspectives.description: Indigenous aesthetic traditions emphasizing land connection, ancestral wisdom, and circular time
